lines.text: How ya been doin' with my balls!

[addressing the new arrivals]
Past and future no longer exist for you. You are going to serve a victorious cause for our Third Reich. It will be for you a great honour to serve us. It is for you a great honour to have been selected. A great honour because you are to be joined and united with the very best of our great soldiers. You won't be sorry if you perform your duties well. You'll find that more privileges are granted.
